ai-mil7.6.1:1.1_0: “Venerable Sīha, you should be cared for seven factors.”
ai-mil7.6.1:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, the one whose mind is pure and bright, who has reached embracing the country of mind should behaved.
ai-mil7.6.1:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the four-footed lions have been suspended.
ai-mil7.6.1:2.2_0: In the same way, a meditator should use the four kinds of good conduct by way of speech and good will.
ai-mil7.6.1:2.3_0: This is the second herd of deer.
ai-mil7.6.1:3.1_0: Furthermore, great king, Sīva flies adornments, being endowed with flags,
ai-mil7.6.1:3.2_0: In the same way, great king, one who lives in good conduct, one who betrays all calling you to live there.
ai-mil7.6.1:3.3_0: This is the third way to get lot.
ai-mil7.6.1:4.1_0: Furthermore, a lion’s not bent down when someone says:
ai-mil7.6.1:4.2_0: In the same way, when someone with robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick, or anyone who receives robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-mil7.6.1:4.3_0: This is the fourth factor of winning.
ai-mil7.6.1:5.1_0: Furthermore, a lion, a tiger, and believes in a definite location, all the boundaries don’t stay there.
ai-mil7.6.1:5.2_0: In the same way, one who lives in balances the household life should not be given when eating. He should not visit families beforehand or getting rid of the lay life. He should not go to a deft and eat whatever food he needs.
ai-mil7.6.1:5.3_0: This is the fifth herd of deer.
ai-mil7.6.1:6.1_0: Furthermore, a cowherd provides horses with their own hands, and won’t get caught up in. And when he doesn’t come back again,
ai-mil7.6.1:6.2_0: In the same way, a meditator who is engaged in good conduct, he should be riches like the use of wealth.
ai-mil7.6.1:6.3_0: This is the sixth herd of deer.
ai-mil7.6.1:7.1_0: Furthermore, a person isn’t got anything that’s been got lost, destroyed, or eaten what is unfinished. And that’s unconcerned, not untied.
ai-mil7.6.1:7.2_0: In the same way, great king, one who lives without hanging food given by using what he hasn’t attained, and one who is untied, uninfatuated, unattached, seeing the drawbacks, and understanding the escape.
ai-mil7.6.1:7.3_0: This is the seventh herd of deer.
ai-mil7.6.1:7.4_0: The Buddha has given this statement to the Theras,
ai-mil7.6.1:8.1_0: ‘Mendicants, Kassapa is content with any kind of alms-food ...
ai-mil7.6.1:9.1_0: The first enquiry, the first (winds) is the first thing,
